cocktails.ingredients:
1.5 oz. Blackberry/Mint syrup
1.5oz. Jameson's
Ginger Beer
cocktails.instructions: Build in glass over fresh ice, stir.
cocktails.name: Irish Hello

cocktails.ingredients:
1.5 oz. Pineapple Juice
0.5 oz. Simple Syrup
0.5 oz. Lime Juice
0.5 oz. Triple Sec
0.5 oz. Aperol
1.5 oz Don Q rum
2 dashes Angestora bitters
cocktails.instructions: Combine ingredients in mixing glass with ice, shake and strain into glass over fresh ice
cocktails.name: Sunset Strip

cocktails.ingredients:
1.5 oz. Honey Syrup
1 oz. Lemon Juice
0.5 oz. Triple sec
1.5oz Casamigos Tequla
2 fresh thyme sprigs
cocktails.instructions: Combine ingredients in mixing glass with ice, shake and strain into glass over fresh ice
cocktails.name: Tequila Thyme
